com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project
Interface Projector

All Known Implementing Classes:
AzimuthProjection, ConicalProjection, GnomonicProjection, MercatorProjection, MollweideProjection, OrthographicProjection, PetersProjection, SinusoidProjection, SquareProjection, StereographicProjection
public interface Projector

Interface that the different projection classes must implement Information on map projections can be found at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Map_projection

Version:
$Id: Projector.java,v 1.4 2006/07/06 06:58:34 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

fillRGB

void fillRGB(int x,
             int y,
             int[] col)
Get the colour component of a pixel at the specified coordinates the supplied array will be set to the correct colour.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate to be retrieved
y - The y coordinate to be retrieved
col - The colour array to be used to store the colour
